ArgonTest.Name: Abstract class
ArgonTest.InputSource:
import Argon.Core/*
abstract open class A <: Object public new() end
public abstract proc self.say_hello(): Unit end
class B <: A public new() initialize _ = A.new() end
public override proc self.say_hello(): Unit do puts 'Hello World' end
end
proc main(): Unit do val a: A = B.new() a.say_hello() end
